description: A Logia-type Devil Fruit that grants the power to create, control, and become lightning at will, making the user a Lightning Human. It is considered one of the most powerful Devil Fruits.

abilities.description: User can generate and discharge powerful bolts of lightning to attack opponents.
Enel can send overwhelming amounts of electricity through opponents' bodies, causing severe burns and unconsciousness.

weaknesses.description: Rubber is a natural insulator and is immune to electrical attacks, making rubber-based Devil Fruit users like Luffy natural counters.

keyMoments.description: Enel demonstrates the overwhelming offensive power of the Goro Goro no Mi by effortlessly defeating Sanji.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the fruit's combat effectiveness against powerful opponents.

keyMoments.description: Enel continues to demonstrate his lightning powers by defeating Usopp.
keyMoments.significance: Further establishes the fruit's offensive capabilities.

reveals.information: The fruit's attacks can instantly incapacitate even skilled fighters like Sanji

description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to replicate and sprout pieces of their body from any surface within range, making the user a Blooming Human.

abilities.description: Robin sprouts six arms to grab and twist a target, potentially breaking bones or causing injury.

keyMoments.description: Robin uses Seis Fleur: Twist technique during the Skypiea conflicts.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates a specific combat application of Robin's Devil Fruit powers.

reveals.information: Robin can use the Seis Fleur: Twist variation of her powers

description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that makes the user's body rubber, allowing them to stretch and be immune to blunt attacks and electricity.

keyMoments.description: Luffy uses his rubber abilities to deflect Wyper's cannon attacks.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the defensive applications of the Gomu Gomu no Mi.
